description: Juicy grilled beef patty with cheese, lettuce, tomato, and onion.
Crispy golden fries with a pinch of salt.
Fresh romaine lettuce, parmesan, croutons, and Caesar dressing.
Traditional Turkish lentil soup served with lemon.
Marinated chicken breast grilled to perfection.
Rich chocolate layered cake with ganache.
Chilled soft drink.
Fluffy pancakes served with maple syrup.
Three-egg omelette with your choice of fillings.
Mixed vegetables stir-fried in a savory sauce.
Healthy quinoa salad with mixed greens and vinaigrette.
Creamy vanilla ice cream served with chocolate sauce.
Delicious tart filled with seasonal fruits and custard.
Freshly squeezed orange juice.
Hot brewed coffee, perfect for any time of day.
Spicy grilled chicken wings served with dip.
Classic Greek salad with feta, olives, and tomatoes.
Creamy mushroom soup garnished with herbs.
Crispy battered fish with golden fries.
Grilled vegetable patty with lettuce and tomato.
Classic apple pie with cinnamon.
Refreshing soda water.
Poached eggs on English muffin with hollandaise sauce.
Crispy chickpea balls served with tahini.
Grilled beef steak cooked to order.
Rich tomato soup with basil.
Fresh seasonal fruits tossed together.
Crispy rolls stuffed with vegetables.
Homemade lemonade with fresh lemons.
